text: ai nabee! jab tum log striyon ko talaaq do to unhen talaaq unakee iddat ke hisaab se do. aur iddat kee ganana karo aur allaah ka dar rakho, jo tumhaara rab hai. unhen unake gharon se na nikaalo aur na ve svayan nikalen, sivaay isake ki ve koee spasht. ashobhaneey karm kar baithen. ye allaah kee niyat kee huee seemaen hai - aur jo allaah kee seemaon ka ullanghan kare to usane svayan apane aap par zulm kiya - tum nahin jaanate, kadaachit is (talaaq) ke pashchaat allaah koee soorat paida kar de
